revision.text:
'''ECWolf''' is a source port for ''{{wp|Wolfenstein 3D}}'' and ''{{wp|Spear_of_Destiny_(video_game)|Spear of Destiny}}'' based on [http://www.chaos-software.de.vu/ Wolf4SDL]. It is developed by ZDoom co-developer [[User:Blzut3|Blzut3]] and integrates many elements of ZDoom, including [[DECORATE]]. In addition, it replaces several ''Wolfenstein 3D'' concepts by ''Doom'' ones (such as sprites identified by their name, frame, and rotation), with the aim of making modding much easier.
== ZDoom features supported or planned == * [[ACS]] (with differences as appropriate) * [[ANIMDEFS]] * [[DECORATE]] (with "half-length" frames possible, to account for ''Wolf'''s 70 Hz ticrate vs. Doom's 35 Hz.) * [[FONTDEFS]] * [[LANGUAGE]] * [[LOCKDEFS]] * [[MAPINFO]] * [[SNDINFO]] * [[Stacked sectors]] * [[TEXTCOLO]] * [[TEXTURES]] * ZDoom's supported [[archive format]]s * ZDoom's supported [[image format]]s (except [[Build tiles]])
In addition, a new map format inspired from [[UDMF]] is supported, called ''Universal Wolf Map Format''.
